https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yFihWxQcmqcaBR31QM6Y8gT6aYV.jpg NYPD cop John McClane's plan to reconcile with his estranged wife is thrown for a serious loop when, minutes after he arrives at her office, the entire building is overtaken by a group of terrorists. With little help from the LAPD, wisecracking McClane sets out to single-handedly rescue the hostages and bring the bad guys down. Die Hard
